com.gwtplatform.mvp.client

Interface HasPopupSlot

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationPresenter, CarPresenter, CarsPresenter, EditManufacturerPresenter, EditRatingPresenter, HeaderPresenter, LoginPresenter, ManufacturerDetailPresenter, ManufacturerPresenter, MessagesPresenter, NavigationTabPresenter, Presenter, PresenterWidget, RatingDetailPresenter, RatingPresenter, ReportPresenter, RootCarPresenter, RootPresenter, StatisticsPresenter, TabContainerPresenter

    public interface HasPopupSlot
    Author:
    Christian Goudreau

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToPopupSlot(PresenterWidget<? extends PopupView> child)
      This method sets some popup content within the Presenter and centers it.
      void addToPopupSlot(PresenterWidget<? extends PopupView> child, boolean center)
      This method sets some popup content within the Presenter.

      This method removes popup content within the Presenter.

    • Method Detail

      • addToPopupSlot

        void addToPopupSlot(PresenterWidget<? extends PopupView> child)
        This method sets some popup content within the Presenter and centers it. The view associated with the content's presenter must inherit from PopupView. The popup will be visible and the corresponding presenter will receive the lifecycle events as needed.

        Contrary to the View.setInSlot(Object, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsWidget) method, no ResetPresentersEvent is fired, so PresenterWidget.onReset() is not invoked.

        Parameters:
        child - The popup child, a PresenterWidget.
        See Also:
        addToPopupSlot(PresenterWidget)

      • addToPopupSlot

        void addToPopupSlot(PresenterWidget<? extends PopupView> child,
                  boolean center)
        This method sets some popup content within the Presenter. The view associated with the content's presenter must inherit from PopupView. The popup will be visible and the corresponding presenter will receive the lifecycle events as needed.

        Contrary to the View.setInSlot(Object, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.IsWidget) method, no ResetPresentersEvent is fired, so PresenterWidget.onReset() is not invoked.

        Parameters:
        child - The popup child, a PresenterWidget.
        center - Pass true to center the popup, otherwise its position will not be adjusted.
        See Also:
        addToPopupSlot(PresenterWidget)

      • removeFromPopupSlot

        void removeFromPopupSlot(PresenterWidget<? extends PopupView> child)
        This method removes popup content within the Presenter. The view associated with the content's presenter must inherit from PopupView.
        Parameters:
        child - The popup child, a PresenterWidget, which has previously been added using addToPopupSlot(PresenterWidget) or addToPopupSlot(PresenterWidget, boolean)
